history.proof: intros H. sfirstorder use: is_sup_seq_lub unfold: Rbar_is_upper_bound, Rbar_is_lub.

exceptions.exn: In environment u : nat -> Rbar l0 : R n : nat H : is_sup_seq u l0 Hl : Rbar_lt (u n) (l0 + {| pos := 1; cond_pos := Rlt_0_1 |}) Unable to unify "Rbar_lt (u n) (l0 + {| pos := 1; cond_pos := Rlt_0_1 |})" with "match u n with | Finite x => x <= l0 | p_infty => False | m_infty => True end".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.
In environment u : nat -> Rbar n : nat H : is_sup_seq u p_infty Unable to unify "True" with "Rbar_le (u n) p_infty".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.
In environment u : nat -> Rbar n : nat H : is_sup_seq u m_infty The term "0%nat" has type "nat" while it is expected to have type "R".
In environment u : nat -> Rbar n : nat H : forall (M : R) (n : nat), Rbar_lt (u n) M The term "Rlt_0_1" has type "0 < 1" while it is expected to have type "R".

In environment H0 : 0 < 1 u : nat -> Rbar n : nat H : forall (M : R) (n : nat), Rbar_lt (u n) M Unable to unify "match u ?M2888 with | Finite x => match Finite ?M2887 with | Finite y => x < y | p_infty => True | m_infty => False end | p_infty => False | m_infty => match Finite ?M2887 with | m_infty => False | _ => True end end" with "False".

original: intros H. destruct l as [l0| |]. - destruct (H (mkposreal 1 Rlt_0_1)) as [Hl _]. specialize (Hl n). unfold Rbar_le. simpl. apply Hl. - apply I. - exfalso. specialize (H 0%nat). specialize (H Rlt_0_1). simpl in H. apply H.
